To update the most recently contacted person's phone number, I need to know which of the contacts you last interacted with and the date of your last interaction. Unfortunately, the system currently does not keep track of interaction dates, so it's not possible to determine who you last contacted based solely on the existing records.

If you can specify which contact it was, I will gladly update their information for you. Alternatively, if you keep external records that can help identify the last interaction, you can use that to let me know.
I don't have any other details.

In that case, I will proceed with updating the phone number for the most recent entry in your contact list, which is "Homer S" with the current phone number "+10000000000". Let me know if you'd like to proceed with this contact or if there are any other preferences.
